text: I'm trying to figure out where I can configure routing. I need a route for /product/*  to always use the same template.

Our Ecommerce platform <http://www.commerce7.com|www.commerce7.com> is fully API based solution. You drop in our Javascript into any CMS and enable it for Ecommerce.  All of our current customers are using WordPress, CraftCMS or pure html.  We have a new customer that just launched with us that is using HubSpot and we are having some difficulties supporting them to get the required routes setup.

I found what Iâ€™m looking for, now I just need to confirm if the redirect will support a wildcard/regex.   /product/*  - proxy to template?

<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/articles/kcs_article/cos-general/how-to-redirect-a-HubSpot-page>

Ok - I found the answer. We can do this. Thanks!
<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/articles/kcs_article/cos-general/how-do-i-set-up-a-flexible-pattern-url-mapping>
